name: No Threat Detected
description:
No Threat Detected is a Swinburne uni student project.
We are launching to itch to help play-test the game and make it as good as possible before showing it at PAX.
So please let us know what you think on the discussion board and/or the feedback survey.

What is this game?

A local co-op puzzle game, for windows.

Play as two robots aboard a critically damaged spaceship whose AI is unaware of its condition. Fix it before time runs out.

"In fire they awaken."

Socials
